name: Bank Robbery Mission
description:
Los Angles police on high alert for grand theft and planned robbery in town. Cunning group is robbing city banks to steal money and making getaway with diamond Heist. No time to make police arrest shoot the rob don’t let them runawa town.

Features
- 13 Thrilling Levels of FPS gameplay
- Brilliant action killing and hostage rescue missions
- Realistic movement of shooting and firing weapons
- Thrilling action game sound effects
